column6: Description
Gain a 6% boost. You can forcefully gift this item to someone else. For every time this item is gifted since you owned it, gain an additional 3% boost. This item may only be gifted once per round.
column7: Gain a 6% boost. You can forcefully gift this item to someone else. For every time this item is gifted since you owned it, gain an additional 4% boost. This item may only be gifted once per round.
column8: Gain a 3% boost. You can forcefully gift this item to someone else. For every time this item is gifted since you owned it, gain an additional 2% boost. This item may only be gifted once per round.

column6: Gain a -3% boost. You can gift this item to someone else if they accept it. For every time this item is gifted since you owned it, gain an additional 3% boost. This item may only be gifted once per round.
column7: Gain a -1% boost. You can gift this item to someone else if they accept it. For every time this item is gifted since you owned it, gain an additional 4% boost. This item may only be gifted once per round.
column8: Gain a -4% boost. You can gift this item to someone else if they accept it. For every time this item is gifted since you owned it, gain an additional 1% boost. This item may only be gifted once per round.

column6: Gain an extremely good breath. If you have Anti-Mint, this item does nothing.
column7: Gain the best breath you can possibly have. If you have Anti-Mint, this item does nothing.
column8: Gain a moderately good breath. If you have Anti-Mint, this item does nothing.

column6: For every letter of the Latin alphabet (the 26 a-z letters) not present in your response, gain a 1.5% boost.
column7: For every letter of the Latin alphabet (the 26 a-z letters) not present in your response, gain a 2% boost.
column8: For every letter of the Latin alphabet (the 26 a-z letters) not present in your response, gain a 0.5% boost.

column6: Gain a 15% boost. If you take damage, this item breaks.
column7: Gain a 15% boost. If you take 2 or more damage in one round, this item breaks.
column8: Gain an 8% boost. If you take damage, this item breaks.

column6: Place one spot higher than the highest-placing contestant that shares a same response statistic with you. If all responses got the same number of votes, then votes do not count as one of the response statistics.
column7: Place one spot higher than the highest-placing contestant that shares a same response statistic with you.
column8: You win ties.

column6: Use this item to replace a random non-"tree" word in everyone's response with "tree". Gain a 0.05% boost for every word replaced this way. If this item were to turn any response into only the word "tree", lose the boost and this item instead and gain Petrified Tree.
column7: Use this item to replace a random non-"tree" word in everyone's response with "tree". Gain a 0.05% boost for every word replaced this way. If this item were to turn any response into only the word "tree", lose the boost.
column8: Use this item to replace a random non-"tree" word in everyone's response with "tree". Gain a 0.05% boost for every word replaced this way. If this item were to turn any response into only the word "tree", lose the boost and this item instead and gain 2 Petrified Trees.

column6: Use this item to gain 7% boost, but take 1 damage. You cannot see your health while you have this item.
column7: Use this item to gain 7% boost, but take 1 damage.
column8: Use this item to gain 1% boost, but take 0.2 damage. You cannot see your health while you have this item.

column6: Once you supervote, get a random (non-player) deal item for free.
column7: Once you supervote, get a random (non-deal) item for free, and an additional Randomize Token.
column8: Once you supervote, get a random (non-deal) item for 50% off.

column6: Negate the lowest vote on your response.
column7: Negate the lowest 2 votes on your response.
column8: Halve the weight of the lowest vote on your response.

column6: Gain 2% boost. This boost increases by 1% for every time you upgrade an item.
column7: Gain 4%. This boost increases by 2% for every time you upgrade an item.
column8: Gain 1%. This boost increases by 0.5% for every time you upgrade an item.

column6: Gain 36% boost. If you score below 90%, you do not receive an item. You can forcefully give this item to anyone else and decrease the boost by 2%.
column7: Gain 36% boost. If you score below 80%, you do not receive an item. You can forcefully give this item to anyone else and decrease the boost by 5%.
column8: Gain 36% boost. If you score below 100%, you do not receive an item. You can forcefully give this item to anyone else and decrease the boost by 2%.

column6: You may forcefully gift this item. Your stats become the same as the person to whom you gifted this item.
column7: You may forcefully gift this item. Your stats become the same as the person to whom you gifted this item. Gain 1 random stat every round.
column8: You may forcefully gift this item. Your stats become half of the person to whom you gifted this item.

column6: Duplicate items are instantly turned into another item of the same category.
column7: Duplicate items are instantly turned into another item of the same category. Duplicate items show up more frequently.
column8: Duplicate items are instantly turned into another item.

column6: Gain a 15% boost. None of the words in your response can be found on https://www.dictionary.com.
column7: Gain a 15% boost. At most 3 of the words in your response can be found on https://www.dictionary.com.
column8: Gain a 9% boost. None of the words in your response can be found on https://www.dictionary.com.

column6: Gives you one Harvest Season every 3 rounds.
column7: Gives you two Harvest Seasons every 3 rounds.
column8: Gives you one Harvest Season every 5 rounds.

column6: You may list giving a certain % as part of a deal.
column7: You may list giving or taking a certain % as part of a deal.
column8: You may list giving a certain % as part of a deal. You may only give up to 10%.

column6: Translate your response into binary. For every 1 in the translation, gain 0.1%.
column7: Translate your response into binary. For every 0 in the translation, gain 0.1%.
column8: Translate your response into binary. For every 1 in the translation, gain 0.05%.

column6: Gain 20% boost. You cannot use any other items while this item is in your inventory. You may forcefully gift this item to someone else.
column7: Gain 20% boost. You cannot use any non-passive items while this item is in your inventory. You may forcefully gift this item to someone else.
column8: Gain 10% boost. You cannot use any other items while this item is in your inventory. You may forcefully gift this item to someone else.

column6: Submit 2 responses. Only your higher response counts.
column7: Submit 2 responses. Only your higher response counts. Gain a boost on your score equal to the Stdev of your lower response's score.
column8: Submit 2 responses. Both responses must follow a technical.

column6: Submit 3 responses. Only the median response counts.
column7: Submit 3 responses. Only the top response counts.
column8: Submit 3 responses. Your score is the average of the median and bottom response.

column6: Submit as many responses as you want. Your score is the average score of the responses.
column7: Submit as many responses as you want. Your score is the average score of the responses, ignoring the bottom 3 responses.
column8: Submit as many responses as you want. Your score is the average score of the responses, ignoring the top 3 responses.

column6: Steal 1% from every responder that does not vote this round. This item must be used during the responding phase.
column7: Steal 1% from everyone that does not vote this round.
column8: Steal 0.3% from everyone that does not vote this round. This item must be used during the responding phase.

column6: Jump up one spot on the leaderboard.
column7: Jump one spot closer to a chosen spot on the leaderboard. If your response already places in that spot in the raw leaderboard, gain 16% boost.
column8: Jump 1 spot up if your response is less than 3% away from the response above in the raw score leaderboard.

column6: If 5 people use this item in the same round, they may all choose their score. This item must be used during the responding phase.
column7: If 5 people use this item in the same round, they may all choose their score. This item must be used during the responding phase. You will be notified if 4 or more other people use this item.
column8: If 5 people use this item in the same round, they may all choose their score. This item must be used during the responding phase. All users of the item must agree on the exact same raw score.

column6: Multiply your score by 2. Has a 25% chance to also multiply by -1.
column7: Multiply your score by 3. Has a 25% chance to also multiply by -1.
column8: Multiply your score by 2. Has a 50% chance to also multiply by -1.

column6: All responses next round must have 110 characters or more. This item must be used during the voting phase.
column7: All responses next round must have 150 characters or more. This item must be used during the voting phase.
column8: All responses next round must have 60 characters or more. This item must be used during the voting phase.

column6: Name an item from another itemTWOW. I will add it to this TWOW (although I reserve the right to make balancing changes to the item, or flat out reject it and make you pick another item).
column7: Name two items from another itemTWOW. I will add them to this TWOW (although I reserve the right to make balancing changes to the item, or flat out reject it and make you pick another item).
column8: Name two items from another itemTWOW. I will add them to this TWOW (although I reserve the right to make balancing changes to the item, or flat out reject it and make you pick another item).

column6: Gain a 15% boost. This item can only be obtained through an item effect.
column7: Gain a 15% boost, +2% for every time you used this item before.
column8: Gain a 7% boost.

column6: Gain 2 HP.
column7: Gain 3 HP.
column8: Gain 1 HP.

column6: Get any random non-legendary item.
column7: Get any random non-curse item.
column8: Get any random consumable item.

column6: Set your Max HP to 1, but gain 4 revives.
column7: Set your Max HP to 3, but gain 4 revives.
column8: Set your Max HP to 1, but gain 2 revives.

column6: Select a number 1 through 10. Gain that much percent but if you surpass first place in raw score, you will loop around to last place.
column7: Select a number 1 through 20. Gain that much percent but if you surpass first place in raw score, you will loop around to last place.
column8: Select a number 1 through 10. Gain that much percent but if you surpass first place, you will loop around to last place, and lose that much instead.

column6: Gain 1 mana for every character in your raw highest-placing response.
column7: Gain 1 mana for every character in your response(s).
column8: Gain 1 mana for every 2 characters in your raw highest-placing response.

column6: Pick 2 mutual sidekicks. (If you place below them, you'll be dragged up the leaderboard to directly below them. But if they place lower than you, you drag them directly below you.)
column7: Pick 3 mutual sidekicks. (If you place below them, you'll be dragged up the leaderboard to directly below them. But if they place lower than you, you drag them directly below you.)
column8: Pick 1 mutual sidekick. (If you place below them, you'll be dragged up the leaderboard to directly below them. But if they place lower than you, you drag them directly below you.)

column6: Remove the burning modifier from all of your items.
column7: Remove the burning modifier from all of your items. Gain 1 HP for all modifiers removed this way.
column8: Remove the burning modifier from one of your items.

column6: Gain 0.3% for every word you use in your response that was not used last round.
column7: Gain 0.7% for every word you use in your response that was not used last round.
column8: Gain 0.3% for every word you use in your response that was not used in any other round.

column6: Gain 10% boost. Next round, gain a Hangover.
column7: Choose a number between 0 and 20. Gain that % boost. Next round, gain a Hangover, but its penalty will be equal to the number % you chose.
column8: Gain 10% boost. Next round, gain 2 Hangovers.

column6: Gain 1% for every character in the longest chain of alternating consonants and vowels (excluding non-alphabet characters) in your response.
column7: Gain 1.5% for every character in the longest chain of alternating consonants and vowels (excluding non-alphabet characters) in your response.
column8: Gain 1% for every character in the longest chain of alternating consonants and vowels in your response.

column6: Gain 0.25% for every contestant you place higher than in raw score.
column7: Gain 0.3% for every response your response places higher than in raw score.
column8: Gain 0.1% for every contestant you place higher than in raw score.

column6: You will only find Passive items until you get a Passive item.
column7: Cannot be upgraded.
column8: No effect.

column6: You will only find Consumable items until you get a Consumable item.
column7: Cannot be upgraded.
column8: No effect.

column6: You will only find Magic items until you get a Magic item.
column7: Cannot be upgraded.
column8: No effect.

column6: You will only find Legendary items until you get a Legendary item.
column7: Cannot be upgraded.
column8: No effect.

column6: You will only find Curses until you get a Curse.
column7: Cannot be upgraded.
column8: No effect.

column6: Block 1 damage for every Consumable item in your inventory when you use this item.
column7: Block 1 damage for every Consumable you have used.
column8: Block 2 damage.

column6: Set your HP to 1. Your HP cannot go below 1 this round.
column7: Set your HP to 1. Gain 1 revive.
column8: Set your HP to 1. Block 1 damage.

column6: The person in 1st place receives a random curse. This item must be used before the voting phase.
column7: The person in 1st place receives a random curse. If you place in 1st place, this does not apply to you. This item must be used before the voting phase.
column8: The person in 1st place receives a random curse. If you place in the top 25% of NRs, you receive a curse too. This item must be used before the voting phase.

column6: Randomize every item in your inventory, including this one.
column7: Randomize every item in your inventory, including this one. You will not receive any curses.
column8: Randomize every item in your inventory, including this one. You cannot receive legendary items from this.

column6: Turn every item in your inventory into a random item in your inventory.
column7: Turn every item in your inventory into a chosen item in your inventory.
column8: No effect.

column6: You cannot lose HP for 3 rounds. After 3 rounds, lose twice as much HP as the total damage you would have taken during those 3 rounds.
column7: You cannot lose HP for 3 rounds. After 3 rounds, lose as much HP as the total damage you would have taken during those 3 rounds.
column8: You cannot lose HP for 3 rounds. Permanently take 2x damage.

column6: Double damage reduction and shield for 1 round.
column7: Double damage reduction and shield.
column8: Double damage reduction and shield for 1 round, but lose all your damage reduction and shield afterwards.

column6: Invite a music bot to the server.
column7: Invite a music bot to the server. Turns into a different Consumable item on use.
column8: No effect.

column6: Gain 0.5% this round for every food item in your inventory.
column7: Gain 1% this round for every food item in your inventory.
column8: Gain 0.5% this round.

column6: Gain 1-4 Rice.
column7: Gain 3-6 Rice.
column8: Gain 1-2 Rice.

column6: [70] Has a 50% chance to give you Sugar Rush. Otherwise, gives you Lactose Intolerance.
column7: [70] Always gives Sugar Rush, has a 50% chance to give Lactose Intolerance.
column8: [90] Has a 30% chance to give you Sugar Rush. Otherwise, gives you Lactose Intolerance.

column6: [150] Get a second copy of any item in your inventory. Its effect is disabled.
column7: [150] Get a second copy of any item in your inventory. Its effect is disabled, but scrapping it gives twice as many letters.
column8: [150] Get a second copy of any item in your inventory. Its effect is disabled. This item has a 25% chance to turn into a random curse.

column6: [100] Choose up to 7 other players. All of them, including you receive a 2% boost for every person you chose.
column7: [100] Choose up to 10 other players. All of them, including you receive a 2% boost for every person you chose.
column8: [100] Choose up to 4 other players. All of them, including you receive a 2% boost for every person you chose.

column6: [200] Choose a letter. Everyone that uses this letter in their response (including yourself) will receive a 5% penalty.
column7: [200] Choose a letter. Everyone that uses this letter in their response will receive a 5% penalty.
column8: [200] A random letter will be chosen. Everyone that uses this letter in their response will receive a 5% penalty.

column6: [100] Reduce the damage you take this round by 1.
column7: [100] Reduce the damage you take this round by 2.
column8: [100] Block 1 damage.

column6: [100] Your score cannot go below 50% this round.
column7: [100] Your score cannot go below 50% this round. You may increase this minimum by 0.1% for every 2 mana you use this turn on other Magic items.
column8: [150] Your score cannot go below 30% this round.

column6: [150] Select any food item. Lose the selected item. You may choose to harvest from the farm any number of rounds after you selected, getting 1 copy of the selected item per # of turns passed since selecting.
column7: [150] Select any food item. You may choose to harvest from the farm any number of rounds after you selected, getting 1 copy of the selected item per # of turns passed since selecting.
column8: [150] Select any food item. Lose the selected item. You may choose to harvest from the farm at least 2 rounds after you selected, getting 2 copies of the selected item.

column6: Consumable items may be re-used after 4 rounds.
column7: Consumable items may be re-used after 3 rounds.
column8: Legendary items cannot be downgraded.

column6: Gives you the "Suspicious" role in the server. This item cannot be recycled.
column7: Gives you the "Sussiest" role in the server. This item cannot be recycled.
column8: Legendary items cannot be downgraded.

column6: Your vote counts as 4 votes.
column7: Votes for a response that are not within 50% of what you voted of that response are discarded.
column8: Legendary items cannot be downgraded.

column6: Gain 0.5% for every letter in your letter bank.
column7: Gain 1% for every letter in your letter bank.
column8: Legendary items cannot be downgraded.

column6: You may destroy any item in your inventory. When an item is destroyed, gain 1 <Harvest Season>. <Harvest Season>s have a chance to give <Rice Scene>s on use.
column7: You may destroy any item in your inventory. When an item is destroyed, gain 1 <Harvest Season>. <Rice Scene>s do not take up inventory space. <Harvest Season>s have a chance to give <Rice Scene>s on use.
column8: Legendary items cannot be downgraded.

column6: Gain an extremely bad breath. If you have Mint, this item does nothing.
column8: Food

column6: All boosts are negated. For every 5% negated this round, lose 1 HP. This item can only be obtained through an item effect.
column8: Food

column6: Replace a random word in your response with "tree".
At the end of the round, gain a Snowball. If your inventory has more than 10 Snowballs, freeze a random item.
You cannot increase Max HP.
Get a 20% penalty. This item disappears after 1 turn.
Negate the highest vote on your response.
Upon receiving this item, set your Max HP to your HP.
Your inventory is considered full at half capacity.
The deadline for you is halved.
You cannot edit your response.
Destroy the next item you receive. Lose this item after an item is destroyed.
Upon receiving this item, set your Max HP to your HP. This item can only be obtained through an item effect.
Lose half your HP if you place below 50% NR.
